name: LCD - Peripheral Nerve Stimulation
description: This policy outlines the coverage criteria for Peripheral Nerve Stimulation (PNS) for the relief of chronic intractable pain, including eligibility requirements, trial parameters, covered and non-covered conditions, and utilization guidelines.

restrictions.condition: Peripheral nerve stimulation (PNS) may be covered for relief of chronic intractable pain for conditions known to be responsive to this form of therapy.
PNS is covered only after documented failure of less invasive treatment modalities and medications.
Peripheral Nerve Field Stimulation (PNFS) is not covered for any condition due to insufficient evidence of medical necessity.
Patient must have documented chronic and severe pain for at least 3 months.
Patient must lack surgical contraindications, including infections and medical risks.
Patient must have no active substance abuse issues.
Patient must undergo a formal psychological screening by a mental health professional.
A successful PNS stimulation trial requires greater than or equal to 50% reduction in pain intensity.
A successful PNS stimulation trial requires greater than or equal to 50% reduction of analgesic medications.
A successful PNS stimulation trial must show some element of functional improvement.
Physicians with a trial to permanent implant ratio less than 50% will be subject to post-payment review.
PNS may be covered for occipital neuralgia.
PNS may be covered for post-surgical neuropathic pain.
PNS may be covered for cervicogenic headaches.
PNS may be covered for treatment resistant migraines.
PNS may be covered for neuropathic pain in the face related to the trigeminal nerves.
restrictions.rule: pns_covered_diagnosis_conditions LIKE '%neuropathic pain in the face related to trigeminal nerves%'

restrictions.condition: PNS may be covered for complex regional pain syndromes (type 1 and 2).
restrictions.rule: pns_covered_diagnosis_conditions LIKE '%complex regional pain syndromes (type 1 and 2)%'

restrictions.condition: PNS may be covered for pain due to peripheral nerve injury.
restrictions.rule: pns_covered_diagnosis_conditions LIKE '%pain due to peripheral nerve injury%'

restrictions.condition: PNS may be covered for post-surgical scar formation.
PNS may be covered for nerve entrapment.
PNS may be covered for painful mononeuropathy.
PNS may be covered for painful amputation neuromas.
PNS may be covered for intercostal and ilio-inguinal neuropathic pain.
restrictions.rule: pns_covered_diagnosis_conditions LIKE '%intercostal and ilio-inguinal neuropathic pain%'

restrictions.condition: PNS is not covered for fibromyalgia.
PNS is not covered for phantom limb pain.
PNS is not covered for diffuse polyneuropathy.
PNS is not covered for nociceptive pain in trunk or lower back.
restrictions.rule: pns_non_covered_diagnosis_conditions LIKE '%nociceptive pain in trunk or lower back%'

restrictions.condition: PNS is not covered for angina pectoris.
A maximum of two services for CPT code 64555 are allowed per 365 days.
PNS trials are limited to a maximum of four leads.
PNS trials are limited to a maximum of 16 contacts.
ICD-10-CM diagnosis code M54.81 is applicable for PNS coverage.
